name: @betterer/monorepo
author: Craig Spence <craigspence0@gmail.com>
description: Betterer makes it easier to make incremental improvements to your codebase

scripts.api: npm run compile:packages && lerna run api
scripts.build: npm run api && npm run test:api && npm run test:dependencies && npm run format && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run test:e2e
scripts.build:ci: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run betterer:ci
scripts.build:extension: npm run clean && lerna run build:extension
scripts.build:publish: npm run clean && npm run api && npm run test:api && npm run test:dependencies && npm run test
scripts.clean: npm run clean:tests && npm run clean:compile && npm run clean:modules
scripts.clean:compile: lerna exec "rimraf dist" && rimraf ./**/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo && npm run clean:rollup
scripts.clean:modules: lerna exec "rimraf node_modules" && rimraf website/node_modules && rimraf node_modules && npm install
scripts.compile: npm run compile:packages && npm run compile:api-test && npm run compile:dependencies-test
scripts.compile:docs: npm run api && npm run docs
scripts.test:dependencies: npm run compile:dependencies-test && node ./test/dependencies/dist && npm run knip
